tool.name: Pdb2gmx
tool.description: : Wrapper class for the GROMACS pdb2gmx module.

param.name: input_pdb_path
param.label: input PDB file
param.help: Path to the input PDB file. Format: [input].pdb

param.name: outname_output_gro_path
param.label: output GRO name
param.help: Path to the output GRO file Format: [output].gro

param.name: outname_output_top_zip_path
param.label: output ZIP name
param.help: Path the output TOP topology in zip format Format: [output].zip

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: output_top_path
param.label: output_top_path
param.help: Path of the output TOP file.

param.name: output_itp_path
param.label: output_itp_path
param.help: Path of the output itp file.

param.name: force_field
param.label: force_field
param.help: Force field to be used during the conversion.

param.name: ignh
param.label: ignh
param.help: Should pdb2gmx ignore the hidrogens in the original structure.

param.name: gmx_lib
param.label: gmx_lib
param.help: Path set GROMACS GMXLIB environment variable.

param.name: gmx_path
param.label: gmx_path
param.help: Path to the GROMACS executable binary.
